DOC.detailed_description: This randomized device efficacy trial . Patients supratentorial intracerebral hemorrhage ( ICH ) admit Cleveland Clinic Neurointensive Care Unit within 1 day symptom onset experienced episode temperature elevation enrol consent . Patients randomize experimental arm , Artic Sun cool pad apply torso thigh five day . The Arctic Sun device keep body temperature normal range 35.5 - 37.5 degree Celsius . Patients randomize active comparator arm receive standard care treatment discretion treat physician . Patients hourly measurement blood pressure , heart rate , respiratory rate , urine output , temperature ( urinary catheter ) shiver scale , nurse neurological assessment . Glasgow coma scale , NIH Stroke Scale Score ( NIHSS ) , telemetry monitoring lab also perform daily . The investigator also collect demographic information patient ( i.e . age , gender , medical risk factor ) information regard current disease process .
